message.body: So I'm definitely excited about Tuesday and realLy hoping I get done early!
Let's hope its a slow day then lol
How's Georgia treat in u. Only one more day
Better today. I apologized to Keith cause I kinda flipped on him yesterday. Haven't thought about him as much today. I don't think I wanna come back here
alone though. Too boring
Come back here u mean?
Nah back to Georgia. But I definitely don't wanna drive home alone
Yeah that's gonna be a long trip. U should make some stops
It was a lot easier coming down. I left at 4 and stopped wherever. Now it's like, I don't wanna leave super early cause I wanna say goodbye. But then I d
on't wanna driving super late. And I just wanna get home
I thought downtown Macon was thrilling
Haha. Sarcasm. There was literally one large building, a statue, and trees.
Any black ppl?
Haha. Yes there are black people.
Why wouldn't there be
Sounds like u are out in the sticks
What does that mean Dan? Is that a half black thing?
The sticks?
Yea.
Means like the middle of nowhere. No streets or buildings. Just trees and sticks
Oh. Yep. That's definitely what it feels like
See u missin that city life now
I don't think I would miss it if I had someone to share it with
Screw the sticks
Yea, I really wish I would've had someone to come with me. I guess it would've been a bit more relaxing too had I not been going through such an array of
emotions
Did u have fun hanging with Ur aunt at least
I only actually got to go out with we yesterday. She had to work every other day
Yeah was that nice
It was. Yea.
So r u still friends with anyone we used to talk too?
I mean work with
No one I talk to on the regular. I still go in to see Kim sometimes. I was talking to Tom brown for a bit. Meg bell is the only person I talk to on the r
egular. And I work with rich now
Oh for real rich works in chestnut hill?
Yep. He got me the job
Sweet. That dude loves the restaurant biz
He does. And he seems to be doing alright for himself.
That's wassup then. Sounds like u keep in touch with a few peeps
I've been trying. Everyone has their own things going on so I feel kinda like I'm by myself.
Yeah I'm surprised u keep in touch with as many people as u do
I try. It's more like I text them for a few days and then it kinda fades out. I haven't talked to Tom in awhile. I kinda don't mind though about that
Yeah its hard to stay in contact with ppl. I used to get so broken up about it but I try not to let it bother me anymore. People come and go
Yea. You gotta find who your friends are. Who's going to be there when you need them. It's kinda became clear to me the past few months. Some of those pe
ople I stay in touch with are just circumstantial friends
Yea but that's OK. U meet good ppl at all stages of Ur life
I guess. Not many have stuck by.
